string.text: NPC Parties
Companion Capacity
Promotion Cost
The cost to pay the new hero up-front. Doesn't affect daily payments. Deafult is 0.
Max. nominations
The maximum number of nominees you are allowed to pick at the end of a battle. Default is 1.
Min. Tier
The minimum tier of unit eligible to become a hero. Set to -1 to only allow units with no further upgrades to be nominated. Default is -1.
Min. Kills for Infantly Troops
The number of kills threshold to be nominated for infantly. Default is 5.
Min. Kills for Mounted Troops
The number of kills threshold to be nominated for mounted troops. Default is 5.
Min. Kills for Ranged Troops
The number of kills threshold to be nominated for ranged troops. Default is 5.
Percentile Outperform
The percentile of kills a unit must exceed to qualify to be nominated. Set to 0 for previous versions' behaviour (only kill thresholds). Default is 0.68.
Ignore Companion Limit
If enabled, the number of nominations will excess the native companion limit. NOTE: Your companion will randomly LOST if you have more companions than the limit. Default is Disabled.
Skill points
The number of primary skill point bonus to manually assign to newly-created companion skills. Default is 150.
Skill bonus
The number of skill bonuses for players to choose for newly-created heroes. Default is 3.
Skill rounds
The number of round you can assign skill bonuses during each round gives [base_additional_skill_points/round#] per skill. Default is 2.
Randomized skills
Should skills to invest points into be selected for you?
Skill Bonus per Excess Kills
The number of skill points that is awarded to the new companion per kill over the minimum kill threshold. Default is 25.
Player's Leadership Skill For Extra 50 Skill Points
The number of points of the player's leadership skill point that is required to add 50 extra assignable skill points. Default is 1250.
Fill In Perks
If enabled, the newly-generated hero's perks are fill in automatically. Default is disabled.
Max. Companions In NPC Parties
The maximum allowed number of promoted companions per NPC clan party.
Upgrade To Hero

If enabled, nomination functionality so that when a unit is upgraded to Eligible Tier they automatically become a hero. Pairs best with high Eligible Tier value, and high lethality. Deafault is disabled.
Remove Wanderers from Tavern
If enabled, Remove Wanderers from Tavern. Default is disabled.
Remove The Companion On Defeat

If enabled the NPC partiy's companion is eliminated after their party is defeated/disbanded. This should be enabled, if you are generating NPC party's companions, as the NPC lords will not gather them back up.
Companion Slots Bonus Base
The base value of the number of extra companion slots to add, if Ignore Companion Limit is disables, Set to 0 for native. Default is 2.
Companion Slots Bonus Per Clan Tier

The number of extra companion slots granted per clan tier. Set to 0 for native. This is applied with a targeted Harmony PostFix that should be compatible with other mods that affect this value. Default is 2.
Extra Lethality

Extra chance for a hero with the "Wanderer" occupation (not Nobles, or other characters important to the game) to die when they are wounded. If you set the NPC lords' promotion chance higher, you'll want to set this higher, to prevent too many random heroes from being created.
Chance Of The Promotion In NPC Parties

The chance of an NPC lord promoting a properly-tiered unit into a companion after winning a battle. This generates heroes in NPC lords' parties. If you don't have hero death, you might want to set this to zero.
Show Warnings
If disabled, the system warning messages are hidden. Default is enabled.
